expo.name: Snap & Send App
expo.description: Receipt recognition and submission application live environment

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This will allow you to capture receipt directly from your camera and send as a claim
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This will allow you to choose a receipt from your gallery and send as a claim
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This will allow you to take photo from camera or choose a receipt from your gallery and send as a claim
